title: How To Try Apple Vision Pro Spatial Videos Right NOW!
description:
I show you how to capture and view spatial videos for Apple Vision Pro using an iPhone 15 Pro and a Quest 3.

Download my spatial video clip of Ruby here;
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/9t7r9veetkgvoo6plfiy8/1700060172922_OU.mp4?rlkey=cc9p8lr33op13vthpi599xe9a&dl=0

Download my spatial video clip of the Quest 3 here;
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/rjfsg2gnpl25obl96wpjd/1700149144969_FOU.mp4?rlkey=6tu7x8xyr6um0ktnkkgv0faz8&dl=0

Download Test Flight from the AppStore here;
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/testflight/id899247664

Download the Spatialify app here;
https://testflight.apple.com/join/EEFFsOzJ

Let me know what you think of this glimpse of Apple Vision Pro's spatial videos in the comments below...

Thanks for watching []-)
